Dasmariñas is a first class urban city in Cavite located approximately 27km south of
You can take a taxi from Ninoy Aquino International Airport (

) to the city. A trip takes about 40 to 60 minutes depending on the traffic condition. It costs approximately 400 to 1000 pesos depending on your destination.
You can also take a taxi from Clark International Airport (
) to the city. A trip takes about 2 to 4 hours depending on the traffic condition. It costs approximately 900 to 2000 pesos depending on your destination.

The easiest way of getting around the city is by tricycles. They will bring you to any part of the city within minutes. A trip costs approximately 20 to 60 pesos depending on your destination.
You can also catch Jeepneys which are common around the city. They run on fixed routes and you can hail and ride on any part of the route. A trip costs approximately 8 to 24 pesos depending on your destination.
Another way of getting around the city is by taxi. You can catch taxis on the Central Business District and it will bring you to any part of the city. A trip costs approximately 200 to 600 pesos depending on your destination.
Buses can also be found on the city. Like Jeepneys, they run on fixed routes and you can hail and ride on any part of the route. A trip costs approximately 20 to 100 pesos depending on your destination.
There are many sights in the city. One of them is the Museo de la Salle.
Golfing is the main pastime of both tourists and residents. It is available at the Orchard Golf and Country Club.
There are many hotels and resorts in Dasmarinas.
